title: Blood Slave
description: After spending the summer running from vampires hell-bent on enslaving her, Candy thinks she can restore some semblance of normality to her life by fading into the background of the small town she grew up in. But normal is never an option for someone whose blood tastes so damn good.To make matters worse, Jimmy and his pack of misfit lycans have a bounty on their heads. Caught in an ongoing struggle between werewolves and vampires, Candy and the Misfits will have to start acting like a real pack before they end up on the wrong end of the fangs.
author: Matthew Tomasetti
